changeSet.id: drop unique key to client group because it is not case insensitive
changeSet.author: ktwery
ktwery
changeSet.sql: UPDATE client_group SET name=CONCAT(name, ' ', id) where id in ( SELECT id FROM client_group cg inner join ( SELECT client_id, lower(name) as name, count(*) as num FROM client_group group by client_id, name having count(*) > 1 ) AS DUP ON cg.client_id = DUP.client_id)

changeSet.id: sql to make groupName case insensitive
changeSet.author: ktwery
changeSet.sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_client_group_name_client_id ON client_group(LOWER(name),client_id);
